parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "Slurm",
  "details": {
    "partition": "mlperf",
    "nodes": 1,
    "wall_time": "12:00:00",
    "job_name": "image_classification",
    "memory": "all available",
    "email_type": "FAIL",
    "tasks_per_node": 8,
    "threads_per_core": 2,
    "cores_per_socket": 20,
    "overcommit": true,
    "benchmark": "image_classification",
    "benchmark_name": "resnet",
    "container": "mlperf-nvidia:image_classification",
    "data_directory": "/raid/data/imagenet/train-val-recordio-passthrough",
    "log_directory": "/raid/results/image_classification",
    "number_of_runs": 1,
    "system": "DGX1",
    "docker_volumes": "-v /raid/data/imagenet/train-val-recordio-passthrough:/data -v /raid/results/image_classification:/results",
    "container_name": "mpi_${SLURM_JOB_ID}",
    "docker_exec": "nvidia-docker run --rm --net=host --uts=host --ipc=host --ulimit stack=67108864 --ulimit memlock=-1 --security-opt seccomp=unconfined  $IBDEVICES",
    "mpi_command": "mpirun --allow-run-as-root --tag-output --bind-to none -x SLURM_NTASKS_PER_NODE=$SLURM_NTASKS_PER_NODE -x GPUS=$GPUS -x BATCHSIZE=$BATCHSIZE -x KVSTORE=$KVSTORE -x LR=$LR -x WARMUP_EPOCHS=$WARMUP_EPOCHS -x EVAL_OFFSET=$EVAL_OFFSET -x DGXSYSTEM=$DGXSYSTEM ./run_and_time.sh",
    "mpi_support_files": {
      "keys": {
        "directory": "/dev/shm/mpi/${SLURM_JOB_ID}",
        "sshkey_rsa": "${HOME}/.ssh/sbatch/${SLURM_JOB_ID}/sshkey.rsa"
      },
      "mca_params.conf": "/dev/shm/mpi/${SLURM_JOB_ID}/mca_params.conf",
      "sshentry.sh": "/dev/shm/mpi/${SLURM_JOB_ID}/sshentry.sh",
      "mpi_hosts": "/dev/shm/mpi/${SLURM_JOB_ID}/mpi_hosts",
      "ssh": "/dev/shm/mpi/${SLURM_JOB_ID}/ssh"
    },
    "docker_pull": "1",
    "run_sleep_command": "",
    "master_ip": "`getent hosts \`hostname\` | cut -d ' ' -f1`",
    "ssh_command": "ssh -q -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $hostn",
    "srun_command": "srun -N 1 -n 1 -w $hostn",
    "master_host": "${hosts[0]}",
    "docker_launch_command": "srun  -n $SLURM_JOB_NUM_NODES --ntasks-per-node=1 $DOCKEREXEC --name $CONTNAME $VOLS $VARS $CONT bash -c 'sleep infinity'"
  }
}
```
